STED SARA Transliterator & Editor - An Open Source Transliterator and Editor for Any Language.

STED

Usage Instructions

How to Use STED:

  • Download New Fonts OR Select existing Fonts to use for the character mapping.
  • Map characters between two fonts (ex: 'a' = 'b' etc.,).
  • Try the chracter mapping by using the sample text area.
  • Save the character mapping using 'Save' option.
  • Select the Input file to be transliterated.
  • Select the Output file to write the transliterated contents.
  • Transliterate by pressing Convert (the current character mapping will be used).
